message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase your product. I would like to counteroffer at $105.
Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I understand that you're trying to get a good deal. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $108.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I would like to counteroffer at $106.
I'm still open to negotiating, Bob. I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal. I'll sell the product to you for $109.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counteroffer at $107.
I'm still trying to find a mutually beneficial price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $108.50. It's the best I can do.
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to counteroffer at $108.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'll meet you at $109.25. This is the best I can do.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. I would like to counteroffer at $109.
